name: Concession Oils Popper's Choice - No Preservatives
description: Concession Oils Popper's Choice - No Preservatives is a kosher-certified liquid fat and oil product designed for popcorn applications. This butter-flavored ingredient imparts a natural flavor to popcorn, enhancing its taste. It contains soybean oil and coconut oil, along with natural and artificial flavors like beta-carotene. Popper's Choice is free from preservatives, allergens, GMOs, and cholesterol, making it a healthy choice for consumers. The product is SQF certified, ensuring high standards of safety and quality. With its easy-to-use liquid form, Popper's Choice offers convenience and versatility in food preparation.

Certifications & Compliance: The Food Allergen Labeling & Consumer Protection Act of 2004 (FALCPA)
